paramInformation.label: Central Scene notifications
paramInformation.description: Enable/disable central scene notifications for 2x-5x button presses.

paramInformation.label: Button operation mode
paramInformation.description: Operations mode for push buttons controlling the output. - Normal Switch: In this mode the top button will turn the output on, while the bottom button will turn the output off. - Toggle Switch: In this mode any button press will toggle the output - when on it will be turned off, when off it will be turned on.

paramInformation.label: External switch type
paramInformation.description: Configuration of switch type connected to extension input S. - External Normal Switch: Use this value if a toggle switch is connected to extension input S. - External Push Button: Use this value if a push button switch is connected to extension input S.

paramInformation.label: External switch mapping
paramInformation.description: Central Scene mapping of extension input S.

options.label: Map extension input S. on the central scene of T1.
Map extension input S. on the central scene of T2.
Map extension input S. on a custom central scene.
